entry.title: Fwd: [BIP 15] Aliases
entry.summary: One of the notable features of the settlement system being discussed is its neutrality, which means that it is not limited to Bitcoin. This system allows for a single address to receive payments from various channels such as conventional financial systems, LETS systems, and of course, Bitcoin. This feature makes the system more accessible and user-friendly, resulting in higher confidence among users over time. It also eliminates the risk of having published banking information held hostage to the assumed liabilities or longevity of an individual settlement system like Bitcoin.
